name: Impossible Journey
description:
Impossible Journey is a small survival game. You are a young mage who will prove your worth, for this you will defeat the monsters of the valley. But is it possible?

Tools Made using just java

Controls: X: attack Arrows: move

NOTE It’s my first game jam and at the moment I only know how to create games in java and generating the executable file at the end. It’s not the best method as WINDOWS might complain and it might not work on LINUX or MAC.

How to play Download the executable file, it contains the game. No installation required, you just click on the game. ATTENTION, maybe windows will block the execution, but press on “more information” on the blue screen that appears and click on run anyway.

I RECOMMEND DOWNLOAD THE JAR FILE
